data.name: Back to Basics Green Variable Rate
data.description: A basic Home Loan for lending less than $25,000 for Green Upgrades

features.additionalInfo: Redraw additional repayments as cashback, with no cashback fee and unlimited withdrawals
Ability to set up automated repayments

eligibility.additionalInfo: Home Loans provided to approved applicants only. Credit and lending criteria applies and is subject to change without notice. Full eligibility requirements, terms and conditions apply.
This offer is available to eligible current or new Suncorp Bank home loan customers (owner occupiers or investors) whose home loans must be at least $150k, LVR ≤ 80%.

fees.name: Staff Assisted Home Loan Repayment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The fee will apply for transfers made to a Back to Basics Variable Home Loan at a Suncorp Store.

fees.name: Excess Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: You can request 4 bank cheques for free. An extra 5 free bank cheques are available for progress payments on construction loans. After you have used the free cheques, a fee is payable for each bank cheque requested.

fees.name: Arrears Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The bank at its discretion will charge either an Arrears Administration Fee or Default Interest if an event of default in payment occurs.

fees.name: Copy of Documents Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we are required to obtain a copy of a document, including Mortgage or title search.

fees.name: Additional Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The first valuation assessment for each loan application is provided by the Bank. If any additional valuation assessments that involve a physical inspection are obtained by us for assessing the loan security, than this fee will apply.

fees.name: Guarantor Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies if a guarantor is included in the loan. Fee is per guarantor.

fees.name: Progressive Funding Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies at loan settlement or first draw (at the Bank's discretion) for any part of the loan provided for construction purposes.

fees.name: Renegotiation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request a change to the Credit Contract or Security and this change is completed.

fees.name: Loan Finalisation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when a loan is paid out in full, This includes settlements, refinances and payouts.

fees.name: Default Interest
fees.additionalInfo: The bank at its discretion will charge either an Arrears Administration Fee or Default Interest if an event of default in payment occurs.

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to loans where borrowings are less than 90% of the property value, waived for loans over $150,000

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to loans where borrowings are greater than or equal to 90% of the property value, waived for loans over $150,000
